item.description:
Ski or Ride Loon Mt.

Wednesday Dec.19th. 9 am. or join us anytime. Lincoln, NH.

Host: Steve Ob1. 603-491-1962    ob@tds.net  Carpooling from Nashua north up rt. 93

http://www.loonmtn.com/info/winter/rates_tickets.aspx

Come on and take the day off. It is more than worth the time. You get so much more on a weekday, than the weekend. You can't even pay for the benefits you enjoy on the weekday. So, take a break ,and join us. You know you will do more the next day anyway. We get the full mountain all to ourselves. The parking is almost empty, as is the lodge, and the trails. Almost no lift lines. That gives you more runs down the mountain.  So, please join Steve Ob1 for a day of skiing or riding. They say it will be mostly sunny Wednesday. Steve Ob1. was a PSIA instructor. So, he will be happy to ski at any level. The plan is to carpool up, and also have some people meet us up there around 9 am. Bring your lunch or buy it there.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Ski/Ride Loon Mt. Wednesday
